localizations.name: 运势-未来趋势
localizations.description: 分析下个月的整体运势走向，包括可能面临的机遇和挑战。
localizations.summary: 了解下个月的整体运势走向，为接下来的行动做好准备。

localizations.name: fortune-external opportunities
localizations.description: This dimension focuses on the external factors and opportunities that may come your way next month.
localizations.summary: Stay open to new possibilities and be ready to seize the opportunities that present themselves.

localizations.name: 运势-近期机遇
localizations.description: 具体分析下个月可能出现的机遇，以及如何把握这些机遇。
localizations.summary: 识别并把握下个月的具体机遇，为个人发展创造有利条件。

localizations.name: fortune-overall trend
localizations.description: Here, we explore the general trend and energy surrounding your luck for the upcoming month.
localizations.summary: The overall trend suggests a positive outlook, but be mindful of unexpected changes.

localizations.name: 运势-潜在挑战
localizations.description: 预判下个月可能遇到的挑战，以及如何应对这些挑战。
localizations.summary: 预判并应对下个月的潜在挑战，确保个人发展的稳定性。

localizations.name: fortune-luck manifestation
localizations.description: This dimension delves into how your luck may manifest in different aspects of your life during the next month.
localizations.summary: Your luck is likely to manifest through unexpected windfalls or fortunate encounters, so stay optimistic.

locales.question: 下个月的运势如何？
locales.overall_summary: 通过分析下个月的运势走向、具体机遇和潜在挑战，为个人发展提供全面指导。

locales.question: How will my luck be next month?
locales.overall_summary: Next month's luck seems to be influenced by external opportunities, a generally positive trend, and manifestations of luck in various areas of your life. Stay open, expect the unexpected, and maintain a positive outlook for the best outcomes.
